name: Mad Rabbit
detailed_description:
Crazy rabbit goes to the warpath with other animals, armed with a cannon shooting carrots and loyal katana. The bloodthirsty inhabitants of the forests, deserts and frozen lands are trying to stop the crazy rabbit, unaware of what lies ahead for them ...


Mad Rabbit - Top-Down-Shooter in the best traditions of Nuclear Throne and Enter The Gungeon, in the game we have a cannon shooting carrots and a katana, which is convenient for chopping hordes of enemies, each time the difficulty level of the game increases and the monsters become more and more, good rabbit stocked up with super weapons after passing the first level of difficulty and the game will turn into a bloody shooter, a dynamic and full of fun.






Game features:
- From 15 and more levels
- Increasing difficulty level
- Hardcore and meat!
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Responsive management
- Variety of enemies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: DualCore or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb
  • Storage: 85 MB available space
